ðŸ“– Summary: Reddittui is a terminal application for browsing Reddit using keyboard navigation. It supports viewing posts and comments, offers configuration options for caching and filtering, and allows opening post links in a web browser. The application uses the bubbletea framework and provides various keyboard shortcuts for navigation and actions.
